oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Words in the Katkop dialect, from =kasin (B XXV. 2355-2360), from !kweiten ta ||ken (L VI.-1. 3882, 3859-3897), and from Dia!kwain (L V.-6. 4434 and 4435, 8. 4615 rev., 9. 4653 rev., etc.). |xam words, given by !kweiten ta ||ken, for parts of the body.
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Words and sentences: parts of the body
